name: Parisian skyline [Tumblr dash theme] v1
description: Tumblr theme for your dashboard. Pont Alexandre III et la tour Eiffel. "The Pont Alexandre III is Paris's most elegant bridge, ornamented with fine sculpture work, adding its own charm to an already beautiful site. It is made of a single leaf arch that spans the Seine in a great curve, although it is lowered so as not to obstruct the view of the Champs-Elys√©es or les Invalides." *
